from azure.eventhub import EventHubProducerClient, EventData
from azure.eventhub.exceptions import EventHubError
import json
import requests
import time

url = "http://api.open-notify.org/iss-now.json"

while True:
    try:
        response = requests.get(url)
        data = json.loads(response.content)
        print(data)

        # Invio dei dati all'Event Hub
        # url = "https://{}.servicebus.windows.net/{}/messages?api-version=2014-01".format(event_hub_namespace, event_hub_name)
        # headers = {
        #     "Content-Type": "application/json;charset=UTF-8",
        #     "Authorization": "{}{}".format(sas_key_name, sas_key)
        # }
        message = json.dumps(data).encode('utf-8')
        # r = requests.post(url, data=message, headers=headers)
        # print(r.status_code)

        conn_str='Endpoint=sb://demostreamaletu.servicebus.windows.net/;SharedAccessKeyName=RootManageSharedAccessKey;SharedAccessKey=5TPjI6Oqer8BGbaQCVf/eZ7VX4CB94dbA+AEhHsUmLE=;EntityPath=eventhubdemoaletu'
        eventhub_name='eventhubdemoaletu'

        producer = EventHubProducerClient.from_connection_string(
            conn_str=conn_str,
            eventhub_name=eventhub_name
        )

        with producer:
            send_event_data_batch_with_properties(producer,message)

    except Exception as e:
        print(str(e))

    time.sleep(2) # Chiamata alla API ogni 2 secondi

conn_str='Endpoint=sb://demostreamaletu.servicebus.windows.net/;SharedAccessKeyName=RootManageSharedAccessKey;SharedAccessKey=5TPjI6Oqer8BGbaQCVf/eZ7VX4CB94dbA+AEhHsUmLE=;EntityPath=eventhubdemoaletu'
eventhub_name='eventhubdemoaletu'

producer = EventHubProducerClient.from_connection_string(
    conn_str=conn_str,
    eventhub_name=eventhub_name
)

with producer:
    send_event_data_batch_with_properties(producer,json.dumps({'test':'005','result':'riuscito'}))
